name: Night Realm's Gift: Crests and Troughs
title: Mualani: Crests and Troughs
in_play_description: When Mualani, who has this card equipped, is switched in to be the "Active Character": Trigger the "End Phase" effect of a random "Summon" on your side. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Mualani to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: When Mualani, who has this card equipped, switches to be the "Active Character": Trigger the "End Phase" effect of a random "Summon" on your side. (Once per Round) (You must have Mualani in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
